topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cee5cb6368722fe8b00000#post_54cee5cb6368722fe8b00000
[bq="HJSDGCE"]Why does Ash never have a girlfriend?[/bq]
Cause they have to eternally drag out the show because of it's popularity and if he were to have a girlfriend that would be permanent character development and if it were to happen then that would mean the show can't go on forever.

Basically what I mean by this is that they keep reusing the formula for each league over and over and over; if they were to deviate from that formula then they would have to start thinking about how they're going to end the show.

Tl:dr; 25 years from now Ash will still be on his quest to become pokemon champion and will still be 10 years old.
